Topic.Title: help me add to my game!!!

Posts.EditableText: If you are looking for buildings and monsters to fight, what about a church finding some crucifix's made from silver to melt down to make into weapons against demons. Holy water, blessed iron to fight against ghosts and don't forget the salt as a barrier to keep you safe. Sam and Dean Winchester does. Oh sorry I'm an avid supernatural fan. Just throwing ideas into the old noggin. Hey that's give me an idea see ya!Terry.
